rooms.description: Two-car garage with automated door and ample storage space, wheelchair accessible.
Additional car parking area integrated into the design for extra vehicle or utility space.
Spacious foyer serving as an entry point, designed with smooth transitions and wide doorways for wheelchair accessibility. Minimal clutter to comply with Vastu principles.
Open-plan living area that flows into the kitchen. Features ample natural light, large windows, and minimalistic design aligned with Colonial aesthetics.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living space, featuring accessible workstations, low counters for wheelchair usability, and ventilation aligned with Vastu guidelines.
Balcony adjacent to the living area. Offers outdoor seating and views, designed with safety railings and easy access from a wheelchair platform.
Accessible bathroom featuring grab bars, non-slip surfaces, and wide doorways, positioned in compliance with Vastu principles for functionality and flow.

openings.description: Large, wheelchair-accessible entrance with automatic door mechanism aligned to the positive energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
Multiple large windows for natural light and ventilation, ensuring a balance of energy according to Vastu principles.
Balconies accessible from each bedroom for privacy and fresh air while maintaining aesthetic alignment with Colonial design.
